# 𓅤

𒍍 ᵇuru₂ 𒌸 ᵇuru₁₈ 𒋽 uru₅ ᵇuru •buru ( 𒌓 BIR₂ 𒀀·𒌷 bu₄uru ) 𓃀 𓂝 𓎛 𓅌 Bach बाढ़ bāṛh baha

𓃀 𓂝 𓎛 𓅌||inundation, flood|बाढ़ bāṛh Bach baha @ Malay ( Austronesian ) 𓃀 𓂝 𓎛 𓅤||inundation, flood|बाढ़ bāṛh Bach 𓃀 𓂝 𓎛 𓅱 𓈗||inundation, flood|बाढ़ bāṛh Bach
𓃀 𓂝 𓎛 𓅭 𓏳||abundance|√poly ⇔ fowl beaucoup µbacha ⇔ much
𓃀 𓂝 𓃀 𓂝 𓏏 𓉐 | stream, flood | app/Bad™ flood / floith / Fluss! ( 𓂝 elle ! ) <++
